episodes.title: I Only Miss Her When I'm Breathing
episodes.plot: Frank is still mourning the loss of Bianca while his newfound appreciation for life is freaking out the Gallaghers. Fiona is determined to get Ian to take his meds and to get Debbie to the clinic for a pregnancy test.

episodes.title: #AbortionRules
episodes.plot: Debbie carries a bag of flour around all day, determined to prove Fiona wrong about her ability to raise a child while going to school. She quickly realizes people are not as accommodating to mothers and babies as she hoped.

episodes.title: The F Word
episodes.plot: Frank teaches Debbie how to work the welfare system to her advantage. Kevin and Veronica visit a paralyzed Yanis in the hospital and try to make amends - only to have Yanis arrive home and try to kill the two Lisas with Kev's truck.

episodes.title: Going Once, Going Twice
episodes.plot: Fiona confronts Patrick about the eviction notice, but her only choice is to get a mortgage from the bank and bid on the house at auction. Ian bakes cookies for the firehouse and discovers he was saved by the shift of gay firemen.

episodes.title: Refugees
episodes.plot: Frank helps Erica through the cancer concierge process as Debbie ups her game with Tyler. Lip tries to protect Helene from the fallout of Amanda's disclosure.

episodes.title: NSFW
episodes.plot: Ian's relationship with Caleb gets more serious. Lip - still reeling from the very public scandal - is called to appear before a disciplinary committee where Helene accepts all the blame.

episodes.title: Pimp's Paradise
episodes.plot: Carl struggles with Nick's absence, taking over the Gallagher home and remaking it as his "crib." Frank and Queenie rule the house, and Debbie returns when she's let go by Erica and Tyler.

episodes.title: Be a Good Boy. Come for Grandma
episodes.plot: Fiona, now living with Sean, attempts to get his son, Will, to like her. He starts to come around, but when Will snags one of Carl's guns at the Gallagher house, Sean catches him and is furious with Fiona, worried he'll lose custody.

episodes.title: A Yurt of One's Own
episodes.plot: Fiona tries to make amends with Sean, who isn't giving her the time of day. Meanwhile, Debbie and Queenie travel to a rural commune along with Frank who is trying to escape G-Dogg, who's after him for stealing his drugs.

episodes.title: Paradise Lost
episodes.plot: Sean officially moves into the Gallagher house as Fiona sets out to plan a traditional wedding. Meanwhile, Kev is not happy about V and Svetlana's pending green card marriage and tries to find a way around it.

episodes.title: Sleep No More
episodes.plot: Frank offers to pay for the reception - then goes scamming around town to raise the money. Sean worries Frank only will end up hurting Fiona and confronts him on it. Their difference of opinion quickly descends into a brawl.

episodes.title: Familia Supra Gallegorious Omnia!
episodes.plot: It's wedding day and Debbie shows up at the church with Franny. Ian finally brings Caleb to meet the family. Frank shows up uninvited - and high - and reveals that Sean is still a junkie.
